mdRecord.dcterms:description: At top of image, a sexual phrase that goes with the doodle of a snake in a boot in the previous image, as the Disney character Woody from Toy Story has the line 'There's a snake in my boot.' Unattributed line from Edgar Allen Poe's poem Annabel Lee. Comment about UVA. Plan to commit suicide, with a date; with responses. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.

Woody licks pussy | But we loved with a love that was more than love. ♥ | UVA is a marching band school | I am gonna kill myself → I promise there's something to live for! | 11/20/17 → start listening to Phish
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Disney characters
